input.sentences: [female] could n't wait for the fireworks show to begin .
the fireworks show was starting and [female] was excited to see them .
they amazed her and almost hypnotized her in a good way .
the show was so great and all the colors of the rainbow filled the sky .
the show came to an end with one big grand finale .
output.sentences: A woman had her hand on the handle to start the fireworks display.
A smally display of fireworks started.
Larger pink bursts showed up against the night sky.
More beautiful bursts lit up the sky.
A bright flame burst emerged in the night sky.
